tool_description: Get metadata and owner's wallet for NFT/Blockchain domains at scale.
name: Crypto Domain Ownership
title: Crypto Domain Ownership

api_list.name: Transfers
api_list.description: Figure out if a domain has been transfered in the past and their addresses.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-domain-ownership.p.rapidapi.com/brad.crypto/transfers/latest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-domain-ownership.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-domain-ownership.p.rapidapi.com/{websiteurl}/transfers/latest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-domain-ownership.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Owner

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-domain-ownership.p.rapidapi.com/{websiteurl}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-domain-ownership.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
